job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The Large Language Models (LLM) team at Nebius is committed to developing a cutting-edge LLM technological stack that encompasses:
     * Foundational model training
     * Web-scale data collection
     * Efficient inference
     * Model alignment
     * Model evaluation

   Our goal is to create state-of-the-art language generation technology for internal use and customer applications, propelling the development of the next generation of AI-powered products.

   The Role

   We are seeking Machine Learning (ML) engineers with diverse skill sets and a passion for large language models. Your contribution will help us construct a cutting-edge LLM stack. We offer flexible working arrangements, with options for office-based work in Amsterdam, hybrid, or remote engagement.

   Your responsibilities in this role will include some of the following:
     * Designing and developing our distributed training and data processing infrastructure;
     * Experimenting with innovative deep learning methods to enhance the quality of our models;
     * Exploring techniques to augment the quality and volume of our training data;
     * Optimizing our training and inference infrastructure to squeeze out every FLOP out of hardware.
job_details.full_text:
ML Engineer, Large Language Models

The Large Language Models (LLM) team at Nebius is committed to developing a cutting-edge LLM technological stack that encompasses:
     * Foundational model training
     * Web-scale data collection
     * Efficient inference
     * Model alignment
     * Model evaluation

   Our goal is to create state-of-the-art language generation technology for internal use and customer applications, propelling the development of the next generation of AI-powered products.

   The Role

   We are seeking Machine Learning (ML) engineers with diverse skill sets and a passion for large language models. Your contribution will help us construct a cutting-edge LLM stack. We offer flexible working arrangements, with options for office-based work in Amsterdam, hybrid, or remote engagement.

   Your responsibilities in this role will include some of the following:
     * Designing and developing our distributed training and data processing infrastructure;
     * Experimenting with innovative deep learning methods to enhance the quality of our models;
     * Exploring techniques to augment the quality and volume of our training data;
     * Optimizing our training and inference infrastructure to squeeze out every FLOP out of hardware.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), including foundational model training, data collection for LLMs, and model alignment. The responsibilities focus on designing distributed training infrastructure, experimenting with deep learning methods for model quality, augmenting training data, and optimizing inference, all core aspects of developing and deploying generative AI technologies.

phrases: Designing and developing our distributed training and data processing infrastructure
Exploring techniques to augment the quality and volume of our training data
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the collection, processing, and augmentation of data, which are fundamental aspects of data engineering, especially in the context of large-scale model training.

phrases: Experimenting with innovative deep learning methods to enhance the quality of our models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of building, training, fine-tuning, and evaluating machine learning models, specifically focusing on generative models (LLMs) and deep learning techniques.

phrases: state-of-the-art language generation technology for internal use and customer applications
propelling the development of the next generation of AI-powered products
job_tasks.justification: While not the primary focus, the mention of developing technology for 'internal use and customer applications' and 'AI-powered products' implies the need for software development to integrate and deploy these models.

phrases: Optimizing our training and inference infrastructure to squeeze out every FLOP out of hardware
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the operational aspects of making models efficient and performant in production environments, which falls under MLOps.

soft_skills.justification: The requirement for 'diverse skill sets' and 'passion' suggests a need for individuals who are adaptable and eager to learn within the rapidly evolving LLM field.

phrases: Experimenting with innovative deep learning methods
Optimizing our training and inference infrastructure
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on 'experimenting with innovative methods' and 'optimizing infrastructure' indicates a need for proactive individuals who take ownership of improving and advancing the technology.

phrases: squeeze out every FLOP out of hardware
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'squeeze out every FLOP out of hardware' implies a pragmatic and problem-solving approach to maximize efficiency and performance, which is a key aspect of engineering.
